creator.title: FIND EVERYTHING IN ONE PLACE
creator.description: Hubbers assists your product development from idea to market.

creator.title: HIRE THE EXPERT YOU NEED
creator.description: At the Market Place, you can find seasoned experts and investors for all parts of your product development.

creator.title: EARN MONEY
creator.description: With carefully selected experts, you get help to successfully launch your product, or participate in exciting contests, and earn cash prize and royalties.

creator.title: MAKE YOUR DREAM COME TRUE
creator.description: Get the chance to create your idea, bring develop a new product or improve an existing one.

creator.title: JUDGE OTHER CONTESTANTS
creator.description: Gain visibility through offering your expertise in particular projects and share your ideas with creatives and investors.

judge.title: EVALUATE INNOVATIVE CONTESTS
judge.description: Offer your advice and opinion in creator contests and help to improve the participating products.

judge.title: GAIN MARKET VISIBILITY
judge.description: Build your network, show your expertise and find new work, and investment opportunities.

judge.title: GET INSIGHTS IN NEW PRODUCTS DEVELOPMENT
judge.description: Be the first to experiment with new products on the market and see innovative ideas become reality.

judge.title: GET PRIORITY INVESTING IN NEW PRODUCTS
judge.description: Find high return investment opportunities and get the chance to be part of a team of early adopters.

contestant.title: EARN MONEY & WIN PRIZES
contestant.description: By using your expertise and skills at innovative and exciting projects.

contestant.title: BRING YOUR PRODUCT TO MARKET
contestant.description: Get the opportunity to manufacture your idea and distribute the ready product on the market.

contestant.title: EARN ROYALTIES
contestant.description: After any of your products distributed and sold on a market.

contestant.title: BECOME A CREATOR
contestant.description: Get the chance to create your idea, bring develop a new product or improve an existing one.
